title: Know How to Google Is Important. Do You Know How Do It?
content: there are a lot of different features on google to improve the results of your search. Google them.

title: What to do when you've been debugging for a long time and your brain is just not working anymore?
content: There are some things to do. But just take a break, walk for a while and come back when you're feeling better.

title: The importance of checking the console on debugging step.
content: The console usually throws errors when there is some unexpected behavior on the code. Remember to console.log the errors on the catch field in order to have a clear ansewer on what to do.

title: Free sources of code training out there.
content: There is a bunch of free websites where you can practice coding with nice chalenges. check them out here: https://cloudemployee.co.uk/blog/programming-tips/10-best-websites-to-practice-coding-online , https://www.hackerearth.com/practice/ , https://www.codewars.com/ , https://edabit.com/challenges , https://leetcode.com/ .
